item.title: Reading List
item.description: Here’s some books or articles I’d recommend. I can’t claim this list is some sort of cohesive narrative, but I’d say all of these have something of merit regardless of political persuasion. I will add to this. Politics Leviathan, Thomas Hobbes. The Putney Debates. I got a copy in one of the Verso sales. We forget our democratic and republican history in this country. “The poorest he that is in England hath a life to live as the greatest he.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me via email.
